Texts.Chs: ^orange;交流发电机^reset;可以为你提供电力，而^green;原木、水或煤^reset;则可以作为燃料。其次你得^orange;解锁物质枪的连线模式或使用技工扳手^reset;。请制造一个^orange;铁制离心机^reset;，然后使用交流发电机为它提供电力。^green;提示：连接发电机的红色节点与离心机的蓝色节点。^reset;
Texts.Eng: An ^orange;Alternator^reset; provides you with power. To fuel it, you'll need ^green;water, water buckets, or coal^reset;. To wire it to things, you'll first need to ^orange;unlock Wiring on your Matter Manipulator or build a Mechanic's Wrench^reset;. Next, make an ^orange;Iron Centrifuge^reset; to wire up to your Alternator. ^green;Red output from generator connects to blue input on the centrifuge^reset;

Texts.Chs: 放入一些水就可以产生电力。另外需要指出的是离心机非常适合在液体中寻找有用资源，而越复杂的离心机则可处理更多的材料。
Texts.Eng: Try throwing some water in there now. Centrifuges are fantastic for finding resources in liquids, and more complex centrifuges process more materials.
